body: The following is reading the results of the natural ventilation demo file on Hydra (window based natural ventilation), in which fanElectric is one of the output variables. However, there is not such input node to read this output on the energy balance component: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/3CskpdhAqAVSjveejJVEE-UXNlw8k6b41XMrYsGwyCrQbBTKnZ1MMw-zTDAlYSyrMbWCsZIdZJJz0ZiJf9dWBvNCKfDMUvd7/Image5.png) May I ask how to report fan electricity consumption in this case as part of the energy balance breakdown? Thank you!
topic: [clarified and updated] is fanElectric missing in the energy balance component?
